name: Ethereum Wallet
description: Manage Ethereum accounts and sign transactions.

tasks.name: List accounts
tasks.description: Return the addresses of existing account.

tasks.name: Create a new account
tasks.description: Create a new account with a passphrase. Make sure to backup the passphrase.

inputs.name: Passphrase
inputs.description: Passphrase to use with the account.

outputs.name: Address
outputs.description: The public address of the account.

tasks.name: Delete an account
tasks.description: Delete an account from the wallet. Need the address and its associated passphrase.

inputs.name: Address
inputs.description: The public address of the account.

inputs.name: Passphrase
inputs.description: Passphrase to use with the account.

outputs.name: Address
outputs.description: The public address of the account.

tasks.name: Export an account
tasks.description: Export an existing account in order to backup it and import it in an other wallet. Respect the Web3 Secret Storage specification. See https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Web3-Secret-Storage-Definition for more information.

inputs.name: Address
inputs.description: The public address of the account.

inputs.name: Passphrase
inputs.description: Passphrase to use with the account.

outputs.name: Address
outputs.description: The public address of the account.

outputs.name: Version
outputs.description: The version used to export the account.

tasks.name: Import an account
tasks.description: Import an account. The account have to respect the Web3 Secret Storage specification. See https://github.com/ethereum/wiki/wiki/Web3-Secret-Storage-Definition for more information.

object.name: Address
object.description: The public address of the account.

object.name: Version
object.description: The version used to export the account.

inputs.name: Passphrase
inputs.description: Passphrase to use with the account.

outputs.name: Address
outputs.description: The public address of the account.

tasks.name: Sign transaction
tasks.description: Sign a transaction with the specified account.

inputs.name: Address
inputs.description: The public address of the account.

inputs.name: Passphrase
inputs.description: Passphrase to use with the account.

object.name: Chain ID
object.description: The ID of the chain the transaction is for. See https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-155.md#list-of-chain-ids.

object.name: Gas
object.description: The maximum gas to use to execute this transaction

tasks.name: Import an account from a private key
tasks.description: Import an account from a private key.

inputs.name: Passphrase
inputs.description: Passphrase to use with the account.

outputs.name: Address
outputs.description: The public address of the account.
